monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Moves heavy blocks
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Attack value.

skills.name: Aurora's Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (300 + 25% Defense) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Auto Restore
skills.description: When attacking, also remove 2 Debuffs from the Monster with the most Debuffs in the party.

skills.name: Buff Charging
skills.description: When this Monster applies a Buff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Burning Heat
skills.description: Every Fire attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Earthquake
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Earthquake Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) physical damage (earth) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Fiery Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fiery Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (fire)

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (200 + 20% Defense + 20% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy

skills.name: Fire Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (300 + 25% Defense + 25% Magic) Applies Burn (Debuff) to 2 random enemies

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (350 + 30% Defense) Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Fuel
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Burn damage, each Monster in your party gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Initial Burn
skills.description: Apply Burn (Debuff) to a random enemy at the start of combat.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Light Instinct
skills.description: Decrease damage taken by 15%.

skills.name: Load Up
skills.description: Shield actions apply 1 Charge stack per shield. Passive shields have a 20% chance to apply 1 Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Affinity
skills.description: Neutral attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Observe
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, shield all Monsters in the party by 50% of this Monster's defense.

skills.name: Optimal Performance
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Constructs in your party receive 10% less damage and are 10% more resistant to Debuffs.

skills.name: Preemptive Shield
skills.description: Aura: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 75% of this Monster's Defense value to the whole party.

skills.name: Preparation
skills.description: Aura: Every Monster in the party starts the combat with a random Buff.

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Relentless
skills.description: Reduces the Mana Cost of all abilities by 25%.

skills.name: Rocket Launch
skills.description: 3 x 110% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) or Shock (Debuff).

skills.name: Shield
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (125 + 40% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Burst
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 140% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: Expends 90% of all Shield to deal magical (neutral) damage to a single enemy equal to 175% of the Shield strength, cannot be dodged, cannot critically hit

skills.name: Shield Lvl 2
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (200 + 45% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 3
skills.description: Shield all for 1 x (350 + 50% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 4
skills.description: Shield all for 2 x (250 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Shield Lvl 5
skills.description: Shield all for 3 x (250 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Shroud
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Agility (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Shroud Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Agility (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
